item.title: Reverend asks Trump to have 'mercy' on immigrants, LGBTQ children who 'fear for their lives'
item.description: A reverend pleaded President Trump to take "mercy" on immigrants and LGBTQ youth who are "scared for their lives" during the national prayer service.
